blog.models module

class blog.models.Post(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Blog Post model.

This model defines the structure for storing blog posts. Each post has a title, category, body text, publication date, and an optional signature.

title

The title of the blog post, limited to 140 characters.

Type:

str

category

The category or topic of the post, limited to 140 characters.

Type:

str

body

The main content of the blog post.

Type:

str

date

The publication date and time of the post.

Type:

datetime

signature

An optional signature for the post, limited to 140 characters.

Type:

str

__str__()

Returns the title of the post as a string representation.

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist
